title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 14 of 2023), hereby
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits 

(Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the Employment Permits (Amendment) 
Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 70 of 2018), 
the Employment Permits 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2018 (No. 163 of 2018), the Employment 
Permits (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 318 of 2018), the 
Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 4) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 550 of 
2018), the Employment Permits (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 138 
of 2019), the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2019 
(S.I. No. 333 of 2019), the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 3) 
the Employment Permits 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 633 of 2019), 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 156 of 2020), the Employment 
Permits (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 510 of 2020), the 
Employment Permits (Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 286 of 2021), 
the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 559 
of 2021), the Employment Permits (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 
273 of 2022), the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2022 
(S.I. 412 of 2022), the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 677 of 2022), the Employment Permits (Amendment) 
Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 346 of 2023), 
the Employment Permits 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 439 of 2023), the Regulations 
of 2023 and these Regulations may be cited together as the Employment 
Permits Regulations 2017 to 2024.

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 14 of 2023), hereby
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 17 January 2024.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 17 January 2024.

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 14 of 2023), hereby
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 (S.I 
No. 95 of 2017); 

“Regulations of 2023” means the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 3) 
Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 680 of 2023). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th January, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [8] 3

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 14 of 2023), hereby
heading: 4. Regulation 29 (as amended by Regulation 7 of the Regulations of 2023)
text_raw:
4. Regulation 29 (as amended by Regulation 7 of the Regulations of 2023) 

of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in paragraph (1), by substituting “The employments” for 
“Subject to paragraph (2), the employments”, and 

(b) by deleting paragraph (2) and consequently re-numbering 

paragraph (1) as Regulation 29. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 8 January 2024 

NEALE RICHMOND, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [8]
text_norm: 4 regulation 29 (as amended regulation 7 regulation 2023) principal regulation amended-- (a) paragraph (1) substituting employment subject paragraph (2) employment (b) deleting paragraph (2) consequently re-numbering paragraph (1) regulation 29 given hand 8 january 2024 neale richmond minister state department enterprise trade employment 4 8

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 14 of 2023), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 by 
deleting Regulation 29(2) thereof. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits (Amendment) 
Regulations 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [8] 5
